name: Naruto
line: (Laughing) Give it up. (Shows the stone faces drawn on with different coloured paints.) You’re just bent, because you didn’t have the guts to do what I do. Do ya!? Losers! Wanabees! You’ll never catch me! (Laughs)

name: Hiruzen
line: (Turns away from his writing) I hope you’re not bothering me with some trivia, and don’t tell me its Naruto again.

name: Ninja
line: Naseer Sabah

name: Ninja
line: is the best person on earth

name: Naruto
line: muah

name: Iruka
line: (In Naruto’s ear) Oh yeah, Naruto!?

name: Naruto
line: Where’d you come from, Iruka Sensei!? What are you doing here?

name: Iruka
line: (Points at Naruto) No, what are you doing here? You’re supposed to be in class.

name: Iruka
line: (Arms folded) I’m at the end of my rope, Naruto. You failed the graduation test last time, and the time before that. Tomorrow you’ve got another chance, and you’re messing up again! (Naruto humps, looking away. Iruka, angry, points at the class) Fine! Because you missed it, Naruto, everyone will review the Transformation Jutsu!

name: Sakura
line: Alright, Sakura here. Let’s do it. Transform! (Smoke comes up around her, then disappears, revealing her transformation into Iruka.)

name: Iruka
line: Transformed into me. Good.

name: Sakura
line: (Transforms back, excited) Yes! I did it! Yes!

name: Inner Sakura
line: Yeah, I kicked butt!!

name: Sakura
line: Yes!

name: Sakura
line: (Turns) Sasuke, did you see that? (Walks down the line)

name: Iruka
line: Next. Sasuke Uchiha.

name: Iruka
line: Uh, good.

name: Iruka
line: Next. Naruto Uzumaki.

name: Shikamaru
line: This is a total waste of time, Naruto.

name: Ino
line: We always pay for your screw ups.

name: Naruto
line: Like I care.

name: Hinata
line: (Thinking) Naruto. Do your best.

name: Naruto
line: (Puts his hands together) Transform! (Smoke goes up around Naruto, then goes down a little, revealing a naked girl, the smoke covering certain spots, and blows a kiss)

name: Iruka
line: Huh!? (Staring, shocked, knocked back)

name: Naruto
line: Gotcha! That’s my Sexy Jutsu!

name: Iruka
line: (Yelling) Cut the stupid tricks! This is your last warning!

name: Naruto
line: This sucks. Loser.

name: Iruka
line: (Arms crossed, sitting on top of the stone faces) You’re not going home till you’ve cleaned off every single drop of paint.

name: Naruto
line: (Stops scrubbing, looks up) So what? It’s not like there’s anyone waiting at home for me. (Goes back to scrubbing)

name: Iruka
line: (Iruka looks down at Naruto) Naruto?

name: Naruto
line: (Looks up, eyes narrow and a pout on his face) What do you want now, Sensei?

name: Iruka
line: Well, I was just thinking. Maybe after you clean this all up I can take you out for some ramen. The good stuff. What do you think? (Looks down at Naruto)

name: Naruto
line: (Has a huge smile on his face. Beyond happy with that) Now that’s some serious motivation! I’ll have this clean in no time!

name: Iruka
line: Naruto?

name: Naruto
line: (Mouthful of noodles.) Mmmm...

name: Iruka
line: Why would you do that to the Hokage faces? I mean, you know who the Hokage are, don’t you?

name: Naruto
line: Course I do. (Slurps more ramen. Then finishes the whole bowl, letting out a sigh afterwards.) Everybody knows. They were the greatest Shinobi of their time, right? The best of the best. Undefeated Ninja champs. (Naruto pictures the stone face of the Fourth Hokage, that he’d painted on)  And the Fourth Hokage’s the one who saved the village from the Nine-Tailed Fox. He was the most amazing.

name: Iruka
line: Then why did you...?

name: Naruto
line: Cause I’m going to be greater than any of them. Me. Naruto. The next Hokage! (Points his chopsticks) A Ninja legend! Then everyone will have to stop disrespecting me, and look up to me. Believe it! (pause. Iruka sucks up the noodle hanging out of the corner of his mouth.) Uh, by the way, I kinda wanna ask a little favour, Sensei.

name: Iruka
line: You want another bowl?

name: Naruto
line: (Shakes his head) Uh-uh. I... want to try on your headband. Come on, Please!? (Bows his head; begging)

name: Iruka
line: Uh... (Motions to his headband) Oh this? No way. You can only wear the Leaf Headband when you finally graduate from the academy and become a Ninja. You’ve gotta pass the test tomorrow.

name: Naruto
line: That is so uncool! (Pouts)

name: Iruka
line: (Laughs) Hey? Is that why you took off your goggles?

name: Naruto
line: Ugh...! I want another bowl!

name: Iruka
line: We will now start the final exam. When your name is called, proceed to the testing room. The final test will be on... The Clone Jutsu.

name: Naruto
line: (Hands to his head; Thinking) Ugh! That’s my worst technique! Great. I’m never gonna pass!

name: Naruto
line: (Thinking) Alright. Get it together, Naruto. You can do this. (Puts his fingers together) Believe it. (Wind picks up around Naruto. Out loud) Clone Jutsu!

name: Iruka
line: You fail!! (Naruto flips out) Hmm...

name: Mizuki
line: Iruka Sensei? (Iruka looks at him) He’s off, but his moves weren’t bad and he did hang in there and replicate. This is his third try, so you know he really wants to become a Ninja. We could cut him a break. (Naruto looks hopeful) And pass him.

name: Iruka
line: Mizuki Sensei. The other students created at least three effective replications. But Naruto could only create one. (Shot goes to Naruto’s clone) And look at it. It’s pitiful. (Naruto is shaking with anger) I can’t pass him.

name: Kid
line: You see that? They called me first.

name: Kid
line: I passed with flying colours.

name: Mother
line: (Off camera) Congratulations. I’m going to make you all of your favourites tonight. We’ll have a feast!

name: Ibara
line: There, you see him?

name: Tsubaki
line: It’s that boy. I heard he’s the only one who failed.

name: Ibara
line: Hmph! Well it serves him right.

name: Tsubaki
line: Just imagine what would happen if he became a Ninja. (Naruto pulls his goggles down to cover his face.) I mean, he’s the boy who...

name: Ibara
line: Shh... We’re not allowed to talk about that.

name: Hiruzen
line: Iruka. There is something we need to talk about.

name: Mizuki
line: Iruka Sensei is tough. But, he’s not against you.

name: Naruto
line: Then why? Why only me?

name: Mizuki
line: He wants you to be strong. With all his heart. But that will never happen if he goes easy on you. He’s like you, you know. No parents. No family.

name: Naruto
line: (Sad. Glum)  But... This time I really wanted to graduate.

name: Mizuki
line: (Chuckles quietly) Then I guess I’ll have to tell you.

name: Naruto
line: (Looks at him) Huh?

name: Mizuki
line: It’s a secret. But I’m gonna let you in on it.

name: Naruto
line: (Eyes wide, thinking) A secret?

name: Hiruzen
line: Iruka.

name: Iruka
line: What is it, Lord Hokage?

name: Hiruzen
line: I know how you feel. You grew up just like Naruto. Without knowing the love of a Mother and Father. The warmth of a family.

name: Ninja
line: It’s getting closer! Don’t let it near the village!

name: Young Iruka
line: Let me go! My Mom and Dad are still fighting back there! Ah!!!

name: Mizuki
line: Iruka Sensei. Wake up!

name: Iruka
line: What? What is it?

name: Mizuki
line: You need to come to Lord Hokage’s right away. It’s Naruto. He stole the Sacred Scroll.

name: Iruka
line: (Shocked) You mean the Scroll of Sealing? No!

name: Naruto
line: Let’s see... The first one is... Multi-Shadow Clone Jutsu. (Puts a hand to his head, frustrated) Ah! Not this again. It’s my worst Jutsu!

name: Iwana
line: The scroll contains secrets that were sealed by the first Hokage. Secrets known only to our village.

name: Yajirobee
line: If it falls into the wrong hands, they could destroy our entire way of life.

name: Hiruzen
line: Alright. Bring Naruto here at once!

name: s
line: Sir!

name: Iruka
line: (Thinking) Where would he go?

name: Mizuki
line: (Thinking) Now that I told everyone what Naruto did, I can eliminate him. They’ll be glad he’s gone. (Smiling evilly) And of course I keep the scroll for myself.

name: Iruka
line: It’s all over. (laughs)

name: Iruka
line: Huh?

name: Naruto
line: Got me already? Not bad. You’re quick, Sensei. I only had time to learn one technique.

name: Iruka
line: (Thinking) He’s been out here practicing. I can tell how hard he’s been working.

name: Naruto
line: (Happy) Listen, Iruka Sensei! I’m going to show you this amazing Jutsu and you’re going to let me graduate and everything will be okay. That’s the way it works, right? Anyone who learns Jutsu from this scroll passes.

name: Iruka
line: Huh? Where’d you get that idea?

name: Naruto
line: Mizuki Sensei told me about it. Believe it. (Turns to show the scroll on his back) He told me where to find the scroll... (Turns back to Iruka) ... And this place... (Naruto stops, noticing Iruka’s shocked face)

name: Iruka
line: (Thinking) Huuh? Mizuki?

name: Iruka
line: Look out!

name: Mizuki
line: I see you’ve found our little hide away.

name: Iruka
line: (Looks up) So that’s the way it is, huh? I should’ve known.

name: Mizuki
line: Naruto! Give me the scroll, now!

name: Naruto
line: Wait a minute... (looks over at Iruka, then back at Mizuki) What’s going on here? (Looks back at Iruka)

name: Iruka
line: (Panting, pulls out the Kunai in his leg and throws it aside.) Naruto! Don’t let Mizuki get the scroll! (Mizuki is standing, looking down) It contains forbidden Jutsu, that could put this village in grave danger. Mizuki used you to get the scroll for himself. For his own power.

name: Mizuki
line: Naruto. (Holds out his hand) Iruka’s just trying to scare you cause he doesn’t want you to have the scroll.

name: Naruto
line: Huh? (Looks at Iruka)

name: Iruka
line: Stop lying, Mizuki. (Looks at Naruto) Don’t let him trick you, Naruto.

name: Mizuki
line: (Laughs) Oh, I’ll tell  you who’s really lying.

name: Iruka
line: No, Mizuki!

name: Mizuki
line: They’ve been lying to you your whole life, Naruto. Since the decree 12 years ago.

name: Naruto
line: What decree?

name: Mizuki
line: Everyone knows except you. Iruka’s trying to hide it from you now. He’d do anything to shut me up.

name: Naruto
line: (looking up at Mizuki, wide eyed) What is this decree? Why does everyone else know about it?

name: Iruka
line: Don’t tell him! It’s forbidden!

name: Mizuki
line: The decree is, no one can tell you the Nine-Tailed Fox is inside you! (Naruto stares, shocked) The Fox spirit that killed Iruka’s parents and destroyed our village has taken over your body. You are the Nine-Tailed Fox!

name: Iruka
line: (Yelling) Stop it!

name: Mizuki
line: They’ve all been sneaking around, hiding things from you your whole life. Didn’t you think it was strange how they treated you? Like dirt. Like they hated you for just being alive.

name: Naruto
line: (Tears in his eyes) No...! (Naruto’s hands are out at his sides, and wind has come up around him) No, no, no, no!

name: Iruka
line: Naruto...

name: Mizuki
line: That’s why you’ll never be accepted in this village. Even your beloved Sensei hates your guts!

name: Hiruzen
line: Iruka. Naruto never had a Mother or Father to care for him. He’s shut out of everything and doesn’t know why. Most people won’t even look at him. How would you feel if everywhere you went, people turned their backs on you? (Shows the desecrated stone faces) That’s why he gets in trouble. So people would notice him. It may not show, but he’s always thinking about the family he doesn’t have. He’s hurting inside.

name: Mizuki
line: Die, Naruto! (Throws the Shuriken)

name: Iruka
line: Naruto! Get Down!

name: Naruto
line: W-Why?

name: Iruka
line: Because we’re the same. (Iruka remembers back to when he was a kid, with no parents) When I lost my parents, no one seemed to care. They didn’t have time for me. They just forgot I was there. (You see a young Iruka, trying to cross water on a rope, but he’s acting stupid, losing his balance. The other kids are laughing) My grades dropped. I became the class clown. (Young Iruka falls into the water, then he comes back up) I just wanted them to see me... (The young Iruka laughs, scratching his head, and the rest of the kids laugh) ... And know my name. My school wasn’t good enough to get the attention, so I did crazy things (Young Iruka sitting in the corner of a room, by himself) And then I had to pay for it. It was hard. (Back to the forest. Naruto is looking up at Iruka. Tears fall down onto Naruto’s cheek) I know that’s how you feel, Naruto. (Iruka is crying) You feel lonely and it hurts inside. And I could’ve been there for you more. (Naruto sits up a little) I let you down. I’m sorry. No one should have to suffer that much. No one should be alone like that. (Naruto’s lip trembles)

name: Mizuki
line: (chuckles) Don’t make me laugh! Iruka always hated you. He was orphaned because the Nine-Tailed Fox killed his parents. And that beast is now inside you. He’d say anything to get the scroll from you.

name: Iruka
line: Naruto! (Reaches out) Naruto!!

name: Mizuki
line: (Jumps down, laughing) You know once he makes up his mind, nothing can change it. (Iruka’s hand drops. Naruto is still running) He’s going to use the scroll to take revenge on the village. (Stands up straight) You saw that look in his eye, didn’t you? Those are the eyes of a beast.

name: Iruka
line: (Pulls the Shuriken out of his back. Begins to stand) No. Naruto... (Begins to turn) Isn’t like that! (Throws the Shuriken)

name: Mizuki
line: (Dodges the Shuriken easily. It goes up into the trees) You’re a joke. As soon as I eliminate Naruto and get the scroll, I’ll be back for you. (Mizuki jumps away)

name: Iruka
line: (Thinking) I won’t let you.

name: Hiruzen
line: This is not good. Mizuki has a big mouth. (Naruto can be seen running through the trees in the crystal ball) He made Naruto feel so bad. Worse than he’s ever felt. It could unleash the power inside of him. If Naruto keeps tampering with the scroll, the seal that locks the Fox spirit inside of him could be broken, and the beast could come out. If that happens, I fear for us all.

name: Iruka
line: Naruto! (Naruto looks at him) Everything Mizuki said was a lie. Give me the scroll. Hurry! (Iruka comes up in front of Naruto) He’s coming after you to take it away.

name: Iruka
line: (On his hands and knees) It can’t be... (Naruto takes the scroll off his back, and backs up to a tree, sliding down to the ground) How did you know, Naruto? (Iruka looks over his shoulder)

name: Mizuki
line: (Smoke goes up around him, then disappears, revealing Mizuki.) ... That it was me, and not Iruka?

name: Iruka
line: Because I’m Iruka.

name: Mizuki
line: (Stands up) You’re a fool. (Naruto is revealed, sitting behind a tree off to the side, holding the scroll.) Why are you protecting that freak? He’s the one who wiped out your family.

name: Iruka
line: I don’t care what you say, cause you’re not getting your hands on that scroll.

name: Mizuki
line: As if you could stop me. Don’t you get it? Naruto is just like me.

name: Iruka
line: How’s that?

name: Mizuki
line: He wants the scroll for his own power, and his own vengeance. That’s how beasts are. He’ll pour all his rage into the scroll and destroy everything.

name: Iruka
line: You’re right...

name: Naruto
line: (Gasps, shocked, then hugs the scroll.(Thinking) So it’s true. Iruka Sensei never believed in me. He thinks I’m some beast. Some kind of freak!

name: Iruka
line: That is how beasts are. (Naruto’s eyes widen) But that’s not who Naruto is. (Naruto’s eyes are still wide) He’s nothing like that. Naruto’s one of a kind. Works hard. Puts his whole heart into it. Sure he messes up sometimes, and everyone jumps on him... But his suffering only makes him stronger. That’s what separates him from being a beast. So you’re wrong. He’s nothing like the Nine-Tailed Fox. He’s Naruto Uzumaki, of the village hidden in the leaves. (Naruto is crying)

name: Mizuki
line: (Reaches around to his last Shuriken on his back) Hmph! You really believe that dribble? (Pulls the Shuriken off his back) Iruka, I was going to save you for later but I changed my mind. (Spins the Shuriken) You’re finished! (Mizuki runs at Iruka)

name: Iruka
line: (Thinking) So this is it...?

name: Iruka
line: (Thinking) Naruto?

name: Mizuki
line: (Looks back at Naruto) Not bad, for a little punk.

name: Naruto
line: (Staring at Mizuki, half of his face shadowed) If you ever lay a hand on my Sensei... I’ll kill you!

name: Mizuki
line: (Standing) Such big words. I can completely destroy you with a single move!

name: Naruto
line: (In his stance; 2 fingers crossed over his other 2 fingers, to form a “+” in front of his face) Take your best shot, fool. I’ll give it back to you a thousand fold!

name: Mizuki
line: Let’s see you try! Show me what you can do, Nine-Tailed Fox!

name: Naruto
line: Shadow Clone Jutsu!

name: Iruka
line: (thinking) Naruto... Those aren’t just Illusions. (Iruka sits up, smiling) They’re solid clones! He’s mastered an extremely advanced Jutsu.

name: Mizuki
line: Huh? (Stumbles around) What is this? (Mizuki falls back, and moves back) No...

name: Naruto Clone
line: If you’re not coming...

name: Naruto Clone
line: Then we’re gonna come after you!

name: Naruto
line: Sorry. I kinda got carried away. (Drops his hand. Looks at Iruka) You okay, Iruka Sensei?

name: Iruka
line: (Lets out a breath) Yeah... (Thinking) He’s amazing. He wants to surpass all the Hokage... And I’m starting to believe he might do it. (Lets out another breath) Naruto. Come here a minute. I’ve got something I want to give you.

name: Hiruzen
line: There’s no longer any need to worry.

name: Ninja
line: Lord Hokage...?

name: Hiruzen
line: The scrolls safe. Naruto will be back soon.

name: Naruto
line: Sensei? How much longer?

name: Iruka
line: Okay. You can open your eyes now.

name: Iruka
line: Congratulations. You graduate. Naruto’s standing there, shocked. On his head, is Iruka’s Leaf headband) And to celebrate, I have a surprise. We’re going out for Ramen tonight.

name: Iruka
line: (Opens his eyes) Huh?

name: Naruto
line: Iruka Sensei! (Naruto jumps at him, hugging him, and Iruka falls back down)

name: Iruka
line: (Laughing) Ah! That hurts!

name: Iruka
line: (Thinking) Naruto. This is only the beginning. The road gets tougher now that you’re a Ninja. But if I told you that, I guess it would ruin the moment. So I’ll tell you later. Over 500 bowls of Ramen.
